title: GA3 - Large Language Models - Discussion Thread [TDS Jan 2025]

posts.cooked_content:

posts.cooked_content: how to get the dummy API key?
posts.cleaned_text: how to get the dummy API key?

posts.cooked_content:
Hi Nilay,

In order to make a api call to openai chat completions you are required to send authentication information(openai key) in headers. For first question of GA3 you don’t have to send actual(working) api key, any dummy api key would work(you can put your name, or tds anything works)

kind regards
posts.cleaned_text: Hi Nilay, In order to make a api call to openai chat completions you are required to send authentication information(openai key) in headers. For first question of GA3 you don’t have to send actual(working) api key, any dummy api key would work(you can put your name, or tds anything works) kind regards

posts.cooked_content: which API should i use in 7th question
posts.cleaned_text: which API should i use in 7th question

posts.cooked_content:
need help in question 4th. how can i correct this json body? sir @Jivraj

{
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Extract text from this image."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": {
        "image_url": "data:image/png;base64,"
      }
    }
  ]
}

error:The JSON body must have 1 message

{
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": {
        "text": "Extract text from this image.",
        "image_url": "data:image/png;base64,"
      }
    }
  ]
}

Error: The message must have a 2 content parts
posts.cleaned_text: need help in question 4th. how can i correct this json body? sir @Jivraj { "model": "gpt-4o-mini", "messages": [ { "role": "user", "content": "Extract text from this image." }, { "role": "user", "content": { "image_url": "data:image/png;base64," } } ] } error:The JSON body must have 1 message { "model": "gpt-4o-mini", "messages": [ { "role": "user", "content": { "text": "Extract text from this image.", "image_url": "data:image/png;base64," } } ] } Error: The message must have a 2 content parts

posts.cooked_content: @Jivraj @carlton sir plz see it once.

Hi @22f3001315 ,

You are almost correct, there are very minor changes that needs to be made.

Take help from Chat GPT or use this documentation which have correct json body Vision - OpenAI API.

Kind regards
Jivraj
posts.cleaned_text: Hi @22f3001315 , You are almost correct, there are very minor changes that needs to be made. Take help from Chat GPT or use this documentation which have correct json body Vision - OpenAI API. Kind regards Jivraj

posts.cooked_content: Are we supposed to buy open ai api key ?
posts.cleaned_text: Are we supposed to buy open ai api key ?

posts.cooked_content: No, if you scroll down to the last question, we can get our Ai Proxy key
posts.cleaned_text: No, if you scroll down to the last question, we can get our Ai Proxy key

posts.cooked_content:
@nilaychugh @22f3002034

The API key is available at https://aiproxy.sanand.workers.dev/

The instructions on how to use the token is given at GitHub - sanand0/aiproxy: Authorizing proxy for LLMs

You cannot use this token directly with Open AI or any other gpt. These are only valid via the API exposed by the above instructions.

You get a limit of $1. Use with care.

Kind regards
posts.cleaned_text: @nilaychugh @22f3002034 The API key is available at https://aiproxy.sanand.workers.dev/ The instructions on how to use the token is given at GitHub - sanand0/aiproxy: Authorizing proxy for LLMs You cannot use this token directly with Open AI or any other gpt. These are only valid via the API exposed by the above instructions. You get a limit of $1. Use with care. Kind regards

posts.cooked_content: but the embedding model that is said to be used is text embedding 3 small, which is the model of OpenAI
posts.cleaned_text: but the embedding model that is said to be used is text embedding 3 small, which is the model of OpenAI

posts.cooked_content:
Hi Nilay,

Yes you would need to use text-embedding-3-small model of openai for embedding questions.

Kind regards
Jivraj
posts.cleaned_text: Hi Nilay, Yes you would need to use text-embedding-3-small model of openai for embedding questions. Kind regards Jivraj

posts.cooked_content: i have a doubt, while submitting the GA3, both 7th and 8th questions require the API url to be active and connected right, but its not possible as both the URLs use same port, so if we check my 7th question URL is running right now, it’ll show as correct, but then if i run 8th question URL, the 7th question will automatically show the error, is there any solution to this problem?

posts.cooked_content:
Hi Nilay,

nilaychugh:

both the URLs use same port,

You can run two servers on different port numbers.
posts.cleaned_text: Hi Nilay, nilaychugh: both the URLs use same port, You can run two servers on different port numbers.

posts.cooked_content:
Hi Vikash,

I looked at your answers in backend. In answer you submitted response from openai, but you need to submit json object which is required for sending a request to LLM.

Kind regards
posts.cleaned_text: Hi Vikash, I looked at your answers in backend. In answer you submitted response from openai, but you need to submit json object which is required for sending a request to LLM. Kind regards

You made same mistake here, instead of response use json body that’s required for sending request to LLM.

Kind regards
